html:
8.21.20  6:18 pm   why are ur songs so catchy?

      can't you see i'm trying to destroy the universe

8.21.20  6:05 pm   What's the craziest thing you've ever done?

      was born

8.21.20  5:41 pm   Is the verse-chorus song format bad?  

     no, but........... good luck pinning down what it even is

     I kinda sorta got that impression from your reality video from 1.12.12 11:21am.

      i just watched it and i did not get that impression whatsoever. i was clamouring for 'normalcy' in early 2011, and throughout 2011 i was able to mostly find what i was looking for, then starting around 2012 i started to fuse them together ('normal' and 'non'). i pretty much spent all the way until 2014 doing this (writing). it was weird, everyone thought i had quit or something. no one expected that i was just trying to learn how the heck i'm supposed to do things

8.21.20  5:35 pm   How are you able to make all you ideas

      i don't know, but i will have to do it anyway

8.21.20  5:22 pm   hey bill, I wrote out a confession to the person I like, and one of your songs came on. You calmed me down enough to finish and maybe even send it. Thank you, your voice is lovely

      holy soliloquy of peace, you are very friendly

8.21.20  4:55 pm   what's your favorite kind of pizza?

      perfect

8.21.20  4:41 pm   How to stop overthinking?

      challenge yourself to think 10x more. this will exhaust you and make you want to relax

8.21.20  4:27 pm   Are bananas funny?

      yes

8.21.20  3:47 pm   Why you are so good at everything?

      i thought that was supposed to be normal

8.21.20  3:22 pm   why pyramids were made?

      because pyramids are great. i'd build one

8.21.20  2:50 pm   why is your music so damn catchy?

      to increase the chances that someone will find me and get me off this damn island

8.21.20  2:42 pm   How do you manage to stay on task? What keeps you focused on said task till you manage to complete it?

      looking at calendars can be very inspiring

8.21.20  1:39 pm   Will you ever go on tour? i understand that your songs have a lot of different instruments all played by you, so maybe when cloning machines are invented you could try it

      it will sound better if it's different people, because that way there will be less of a tendency for everyone to wanna play the same sort of thing at the same sort of times, but, i also might wait until concerts are legal

8.21.20  1:33 pm   what is life

      an opportunity for growth

8.21.20  1:13 pm   how does a frisbee work?

      easy. just deposit it into your bank account, and in seconds your bank balance will be 'floating on air'

8.21.20  1:07 pm   are hi hats going out of fashion?

      i severely doubt that

8.21.20  12:40 pm   What is a wall?

      very difficult to describe, but it's like a blindfold for the entire room

8.21.20  12:15 pm   When are you gonna learn new lesson ?

      all the time. every day is lesson day, in lesson world

8.21.20  12:10 pm   do you write your songs witha deeper meaning

     than what

     or do you just sing randomly

     it's impossible to sing randomly. science tells us this

8.21.20  11:39 am   Please help me, this is driving me crazy. What the hell time signature is Schism by Tool?? I swear to god it's 7/8 9/8 but others disagree. What do you hear? I trust your rhythmic wisdom

      let me take a listen......... right, so i tend to hear that one as 5+7. so a quick 5 then a quick 7. but surely you might say "but that adds up to 12, isn't it more likely that this is meant to be felt in some 3 based structure", and listening to it further, these things are always anyone's guess but i would certainly venture that the drummer is feeling 5 and 7. the lyrics/vocals mostly seem to be happiest as 5+7, but some of the vocals are likely meant to go 3+3+3+3. i would even venture a step further and say that the writer(s) have thought about all of this, and these sorts of number games might even be what informs some of the lyrical content

8.21.20  11:16 am   do you want to write a song together?

      sure

8.21.20  11:00 am   Can you do a face reveal?

      never

8.21.20  10:00 am   did you ever do those tests in school to see what kind of learner you were (audio, visual, kinesthetic)? which one were/are you?

      normal

8.21.20  9:57 am   how can i be the best in the whole world?

      make sure you are exactly the same as everyone else

8.21.20  9:47 am   Is being unpredictable predictable?

      almost

8.21.20  8:44 am   Bill wurtz, you are a creative genius. How does that feel?

      you know rugs?.... i feel like one of the strands in the rug

8.21.20  8:16 am   what is your political opinion of oatmeal

      i'd vote for it twice if i could

8.21.20  6:27 am   I love the number 22 do you love some numbers too ? and which ?!

      i've loved numbers so much that sometimes i get molested by numbers. then i hate them for a while, and the cycle continues

8.21.20  5:31 am   would you consider your content to be random? 

      no

8.21.20  4:11 am   how do you make your songs

      by setting up a series of shadow companies i've been able to inconspicuously sell my soul to myself

8.21.20  3:16 am   So, how's walmart?

      pretty good, this is thanks to the fact that they were willing to whole heartedly embrace the world wide web

8.21.20  3:13 am   You ever just, and you just, then you don't?

      no

8.21.20  2:42 am   Hi bill artist here my question is have you ever had writer's block ( or whatever you call art block / writer's block in the music scene)

     no

     and how did you get rid of it?

8.21.20  2:03 am   Are you particularly drawn towards minor sounds?

     no

     I ask because in your videos almost every chord is minor,

     that's not even close to true

     at least that is I've heard.

8.21.20  1:54 am   How many ears is the ideal amount of ears

      100

8.21.20  1:47 am   Is "Wild Frolicking Adventures of Informational Education" related to "history of the entire world, i guess"? 

      yes

8.21.20  1:12 am   Hey Bill whats your opinion on cookies with raisins instead of chocolate chips?

      they are flying off the shelves so fast that they will also suck the shelves right out of the shelf fixtures

8.21.20  1:11 am   What makes a story and its characters memorable?

     i'm not sure

      How would you advise someone trying to write a meaningful story?

      just start writing. meaninfgulness will find you. meaningfulness is more contagious than any disease on earth

8.21.20  12:41 am   why did the chicken cross the road

      it was following another road. going through an intersection with the first road

8.21.20  12:02 am   are there any advantages you've found to adding keysmashes to your filenames?

      yes, this means they will hopefully not conflict with other files which had otherwise the same name. But this was not something i found after doing it, this was something i already knew, and is my reason for doing it

8.20.20  11:20 pm   Bill, your music is so lovely. I love you, and all what you do. I want to write music since so much years, and I do it... or something like that. The point is... what should I do to write music that sounds really good, and other people enjoy it?. Thabks

      i don't know, but if you manage to do it you will be a hero in the name of science

8.20.20  10:57 pm   Why create when you can experience?

      so you can share the experience

8.20.20  10:18 pm   what was the moment like when you first felt enlightened?

      pretty good

8.20.20  9:07 pm   do you think people who do not make music miss a certain depth that music has to it? do you think it's important for everyone to experience both listening and creating music?

     sometimes, when you are learning to make music, this can cause you to miss many of the broader depths of music that are easily felt by non music makers

8.20.20  7:42 pm   how do you do your vocal doubling? throughout slow down, i hear one take panned hard left and one panned right. is there one (or more) in the center?

      often there is one in the center and one on the side. harmonies are always on the sides

8.20.20  6:58 pm   Do the musical epiphanies that you create, vibrate on such a frequency that everyone resonates on?

      that should be possible, if i can do my job correctly

8.20.20  6:31 pm   How do you come up with ideas for songs/lyrics?

      they usually hit me in the face when i least expect. the secret is to develop fast enough reflexes to catch them

8.20.20  6:19 pm   What's your inspiration to make music?

      anything i have ever known, felt, seen, or thought

8.20.20  6:11 pm   are you keeping up with your daily schedule of shaving your piano?

      i never had a schedule for that. i only depicted it once, for a video

8.20.20  5:54 pm   Hey i have been playing guitar for almost two years now and i have found out that im kind good at writing my own things but they never really work out in the long run and after a while they just seem bad to me or sth. what to do please help

      by the time they get bad you should have already made new ones
